我睇法係
1. 因為利率低水平，所以極少absolute change都會係大嘅percentage change
例如1.4%去1.6%同2.4%去2.6%都係升咗0.2個百分點，但前者係升14.3%，後者只係升8.3%
2. 速度問題，慢慢升嘅話市場會適應得好啲

債息升->覺得通脹->復蘇->買番舊經濟股
如果短線一野爆上2厘 納指一定跌多10%
但長線 都係會升番

replies.msg:
係同一樣野
CASH 係冇利息 (monetary asset)
BOND 係有利息 (non- monetary asset)
所以nominal interest rate / yield on bond increase -> HOLD CASH既opportunity cost increase-> demand of monetary asset decrease -> Price increase -> PPP (inflation ) increase ->$$ depreciation
the difference in nominal interest rate = the difference in inflation rate ( fisher effect)

邊個話無關唔該學下finance1001 同最簡單time value of money 先出嚟講

假設10年後有$100 cashflow
10y Interest rate = 0.5%, PV of cashflow = 100e^(-0.5%*10) = $95.1229
10y Interest rate = 1%, PV of cashflow = 100e^(-1%*10) = $90.4837
10y Interest rate = 1.5%, PV of cashflow = 100e^(-1.5%*10) = $86.0708

如果做過DCF(discounted cashflow) 估值都會知科技股expected free cashflow都會偏長期，上面example都好易見點解咁sensitive to 10-y or longer key rates

quote.msg:
邊個話無關唔該學下finance1001 同最簡單time value of money 先出嚟講

假設10年後有$100 cashflow
10y Interest rate = 0.5%, PV of cashflow = 100e^(-0.5%*10) = $95.1229
10y Interest rate = 1%, PV of cashflow = 100e^(-1%*10) = $90.4837
10y Interest rate = 1.5%, PV of cashflow = 100e^(-1.5%*10) = $86.0708

如果做過DCF(discounted cashflow) 估值都會知科技股expected free cashflow都會偏長期，上面example都好易見點解咁sensitive to 10-y or longer key rates

根本based on DCF 做估值的全部要revaluate

quote.msg:
邊個話無關唔該學下finance1001 同最簡單time value of money 先出嚟講

假設10年後有$100 cashflow
10y Interest rate = 0.5%, PV of cashflow = 100e^(-0.5%*10) = $95.1229
10y Interest rate = 1%, PV of cashflow = 100e^(-1%*10) = $90.4837
10y Interest rate = 1.5%, PV of cashflow = 100e^(-1.5%*10) = $86.0708

如果做過DCF(discounted cashflow) 估值都會知科技股expected free cashflow都會偏長期，上面example都好易見點解咁sensitive to 10-y or longer key rates
